channel.title: How to edit/make shops on 667/728 Zenith Source
channel.description: I was just wondering if someone can kindly explain how because, i thought you'd have to go to unpackedshops.txt and then do the editing/making there but it seems that it's not working, i probably have to go in there, but i'm either doing something wrong so can someone please help? Thanks a lot. :)

item.title: How to edit/make shops on 667/728 Zenith Source
item.dc:creator: @svrking27 svrking27
item.description:
@svrking27 wrote:

lol everyones using zenith lol, its cool i am to, i redid all the shops, u r correct its in unpackedshops, but before it takes effect u must delete ur current packedshops file in it than edit ur unpackedshops and compile and run, than it will all be changed, =) rep if it helps

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit/make shops on 667/728 Zenith Source
